product_name: OllyDog Night Visibility Dog Coat - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Ensure your dog can be seen on your nighttime walks with the OllyDog Night Visibility dog coat. Not only does it have reflective striping but it's made in a high-vis yellow so he's easier to spot. Mesh fabric provides good breathability and durablity; adjustable rip-and-stick tabs at chest and belly secure the coat to your pooch. Closeout.
short_description: Ensure your dog can be seen on your nighttime walks with the OllyDog Night Visibility dog coat. Not only does it have reflective striping but it's made in a high-vis yellow so he's easier to spot.
